question:
You have just spent a week with a friend on holiday. When you got home, you realised you had left your wallet there. Write a letter to your friend, in your letter;
Thank your friend for the holiday
explain that you left your wallet in her house
Give her instructions on how to send it back to you.
text: This is to formally appreciate your kind gesture and generosity towards me during my short vacation at your place. I am glad I spent it with you. Thank you for your time and most especially for feeding me well.

Upon my arrival back home, I noticed I forgot my purse at your place. This shows how much I enjoyed myself. I think it was when I wanted to make payment for the online shopping we did. I dropped it on the sofer in the living room, the one directly opposite the Television set.

My elder brother will be coming to your city early next month, and this will be a great opportunity to send it through him. Kindly help me deliver the purse to his hotel when he arrives. I will send the address of the hotel and his phone number to you via the Whatsapp platform. I have also told him to refund you for the delivery fees.
